level.heading: Relation to other provisions of law.
level.text: The provisions of ยง 1-303.22 and Title 5A-1, Article 14 of the Building Code of the District of Columbia, pertaining to outdoor signs in the District of Columbia, shall not pertain to the advertisement resulting from the franchise agreement.

level.heading: Temporary Repeal of Section
level.text: Section 5 of D.C. Law 19-181 repealed this section.
Section 11(b) of D.C. Law 19-181 provides that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see ยง 5 of the Sign Regulation Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-387, July 11, 2012, 59 DCR 8491).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see ยง 5 of Sign Regulation Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-499, October 26, 2012, 59 DCR 12749).
